title: Ahab and Jehoshaphat Go to War
summary: Jehoshaphat joins King Ahab of Israel in war. Despite warnings from the prophet Micaiah, they go into battle. Ahab is killed, fulfilling prophecy, while Jehoshaphat narrowly escapes death.

faq.question: Who warned against going to war?
faq.answer: The prophet Micaiah, who faithfully spoke Godâ€™s word despite pressure.

faq.question: What happened to Ahab?
faq.answer: He was killed in battle, just as Micaiah had prophesied.
